remarks.para: May be inoperative secured closed provided aircraft is not operated in known or forecast icing conditions.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Operations into known or forecast icing conditions prohibited.

placard.para: Placard on Pilot’s Overhead Panel: "LEFT (RIGHT) WAI VALVE INOP CLOSED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

warning.para: ENSURE THAT PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL FLIGHT CONTROL SURFACES.

numlitem.para: Gain access to valve by extending leading edge flap segments adjacent to (and above) outboard engine. (Valve is located just off the pneumatic manifold.)
Move manual handle until position indicator on top of valve indicates CLOSED.
Restore aircraft to its required configuration.
